profile.title: Profil
profile.description: Be careful, this information will be visible to all users in the final version of the application.

profile.profile_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account ?

profile.cover_upload_error: An error occurred while uploading your cover
profile.public_flows_description: List of public flows created by this user

subscription.description: You can manage your subscription here. If you cancel your subscription, you will lose access to all premium features.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Here you can change your application settings.
settings.theme_description: Choose the theme you want to use.

community.title: Our community
community.description: Meet our awesome community of developers, designers, and entrepreneurs. We're always looking for new members to join our team.

provider.title: Connect your providers
provider.description: Connect your providers to start using them in your flows.

my_flows.title: My flows
my_flows.description: Manage your flows, edit, delete, and share them.
my_flows.no_flows: You don't have any flows yet
my_flows.no_flows_description: Create your first flow by clicking on the button below.

builder.change_name: You can change the name of your flow by clicking on it.
builder.variables_description: You can use these variables in your actions. Just click on them to copy them to your clipboard and paste them in your action.

builder.create_flow_error: An error occurred while creating your flow
builder.where_trigger: Where your flow will be triggered
builder.need_trigger: You need to add a trigger

details.description: Designed to be fast to the last pixel, helpr combines UI excellence and fast performance.

cta.title:
Say hello to your
brand new
cta.description: Join our communities of people who dont waste time

features.fastDescription: Helpr is fast, really fast, you can create your first flow in less than 2 minutes
features.dynamicDescription: Create powerful flows with our dynamic actions, use variables, ai generated text, and more
features.integrationsDescription: Integrated with many providers, you can also create your own integrations
features.secureDescription: Secure, your data is encrypted and we don't store your data
features.crossPlatformDescription: Available on all platforms, you can use Helpr on your computer, tablet or phone
features.customizableDescription: Fully customizable, change your theme, language, or even create your own integrations
features.consoleDescription: Meet our console, A powerful tool to enhance your experience, type in ⌘ K for the magic to happen
features.keyboardDescription: Designed to be used with your keyboard and provide many shortcuts, try to catch them all ;)
features.privacyDescription: Privacy focused, we don't store your data and we don't track you, and more your API connections are fully encrypted

pricing.description: Push the boundaries of your productivity by connecting AI, translation, APIs and more!!!
pricing.terms: Mensual subscription. You can cancel your subscription at any time.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: A bug? A question? A suggestion? We are here to help you.
contact.success: Your message to the team has been sent successfully
contact.error: Oups, an error occurred while sending your message

team.title: Our team
team.description: Meet our awesome team of developers, designers, and entrepreneurs. We're always looking for new members to join our team.

integrations.description: Enhance your workflow with a wide variety of add-ons and integrations. From everyday essentials to powerful pro workflows.
integrations.featured_description: Must have flows, that you must add to your workflow !!!
